name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
title: Medical Practice: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
desc: "Come sun or rain, nothing could stay the traveling doctor's steps."
inPlayDescription: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After the character uses an Elemental Burst: Heal all of your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After the character uses an Elemental Burst: Heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
